20.eng-name: The Book on Vows and Oaths
20.ara-name: كتاب النذور والأيمان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Umar:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "Whoever swears about an oath and says: 'If Allah wills (Insha Allah), then there is no breaking of the oath against him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الاِسْتِثْنَاءِ فِي الْيَمِينِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Making Exceptions In Oath
